title: Dark Fae Extinction Box Set
description: A dark fae warrior took me captive;I am an unwilling slave, hell-bent on destroying him;But in the end, it could be me destroyed - heart and soul. Fans of CN CRAWFORD, LAURA THALASSA and JENNIFER L. ARMENTROUT will love this deliciously dark fae series.The world was plunged into eternal darkness, riddled by famine and plague. Then when most of humanity had fallen, they came to finish us off.The dark fae, cruel warriors of myth, came to kill the last of us. I'm Coralie - and I won't go down without a fight. A brutal, lone fae warrior, a lost and wounded human - and desires so forbidden they must be fought.>This box set is the full collection of the Dark Fae: Extinction series. See Inside for content warnings.
author: Quinn Blackbird
